alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:22PM CDT until July 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Henderson County in west central Illinois... Northern Warren County in west central Illinois... East central Des Moines County in southeastern Iowa... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 622 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lone Tree, or near Oquawka, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monmouth, Oquawka, Kirkwood, Biggsville, Gladstone, Rozetta, Ormonde, Gerlaw, Delabar State Park, Eleanor and Monmouth Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
